Detailed Description

template<class NrnData, class NrnActMech, class TypeBase>
class NeuronTemplate< NrnData, NrnActMech, TypeBase >

NeuronTemplate class template definition.

data (list of synapses, etc) are in NrnData the activation update mechanism is dealt with by NrnActMech the interface is TypeBase
